mapper.select: SELECT K.ikid, K.kid_nm AS kidNm FROM t_kid K JOIN t_parent_kid P ON K.ikid = P.ikid WHERE K.ikid = #{ikid}

SELECT a.iparent, a.irelation, a.ilevel, a.uid, a.upw , a.parent_nm as parentNm, a.phone_nb as phoneNb , a.created_at as createdAt, a.pr_email as prEmail , a.firebase_token as firebaseToken, b.ikid from t_parent a join t_parent_kid b on a.iparent = b.iparent where uid = #{uid} and upw = #{upw}
